name: Rubiskit
description: A virtual Rubik's cube with both 2D and 3D implementations. Ensure you pronounce it roo-biscuit, emphasis on the biscuit.
prompts: The Rubik's cube has 43,252,003,274,489,856,000 possible scrambles. Click here to try one of them!

name: Automatarium

name: Elementary
description: A simple implementation of Stephen Wolfram's elementary cellular automata.
